txt.en: Once the loyal caretakers to the elder Huorns of the great wood, the bog-lurkers of Agamaur are a fallen and corrupt group of beings beyond saving. They have learned to relish the blood of the living, and in so doing, have become the very evil they once stopped from spreading through the lands.
Once noble guardians of the forest, the bog-lurkers in the Arboretum of Garth Agarwen are now twisted and terrible creatures thriving on blood. They must be slain for they cannot be saved.
